mapper.select: select id,at_id as atid,uid,pnum,addtime,remark,iphone,idcard from t_at_users where 1=1 and at_id=#{atid} and uid=#{uid}
select sum(pnum) from t_at_users where 1=1 and at_id=#{id}

select t1.id,t1.at_id as atid,t1.uid,t1.remark,t1.iphone,t1.idcard,t2.joy_fee*t1.pnum as joyFee,t3.userid,t3.mobile,t3.icon,t1.addtime as partiTime,t1.pnum as partiNum,t2.name,t2.pnum as atNum from t_at_users t1,t_activities t2,t_users t3 where 1=1 and t1.at_id=#{id} and t1.at_id=t2.id and t1.uid=t3.uid order by t1.addtime asc

select t1.id,t1.at_id as atid,t1.uid,t1.remark,t1.iphone,t1.idcard,t2.joy_fee as joyFee,t3.userid,t3.mobile,t3.icon,t1.addtime as partiTime,t1.pnum as partiNum,t2.name,t2.pnum as atNum from t_at_users t1,t_activities t2,t_users t3 where 1=1 and t1.at_id=#{id} and t1.id in #{item} and t1.at_id=t2.id and t1.uid=t3.uid order by t1.addtime asc
select t1.at_id,t1.addtime, t2.userid,t2.nickname,t3.name from t_at_users t1,t_users t2,t_activities t3 where 1=1 and t1.uid=t2.uid and t1.at_id=t3.id order by addtime desc limit 0,6
select count(*) from t_at_users t1 ,t_activities t2 where 1=1 and t1.uid=#{uid} and t1.at_id=t2.id order by addtime desc
select t1.at_id as atid,t2.name,t1.addtime from t_at_users t1 ,t_activities t2 where 1=1 and t1.uid=#{uid} and t1.at_id=t2.id order by addtime desc limit #{start},#{size}
